ygData.subject: Re: Cazic Thule slain on Innoruuk.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehehe wow someone who knows who FoH is. I play on Veeshan with a lvl 50 necro and run in to them ks ng me all the time on big events. My guild and a few
ygData.messageBody:
Hehehe wow someone who knows who FoH is. I play on Veeshan with a lvl 50
necro and run in to them ks'ng me all the time on big events. My guild and a
few others got so sick of it we are banding together. Now FoH posted a
message on Sony's message board about how there are so many high lvls on the
servers that there need to be more planes and more dragons and what not
cause there is going to be lots of KS'ng and fighting over spawns and what
not. Man someone finally gets the player base to stand up to them and they
run whimpering with there tails between their legs. Pay back's a bi**h.
Anyways been lurking for a couple days getting ideas just started a twink
bard and got it up to lvl 7.


>From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Cazic Thule slain on Innoruuk.
>Date: Tue, 4 Jan 2000 12:06:17 -0500 (EST)
>
> > Pray that the fallout from your raid is nothing like the one on Prexus.
>The
> > good feelings from the raids (Vox, Nagefen and Fear all went down in a
> > period of 3 days) quickly turned into animosity, arguments, cries of
> > elitism, and just plain bad mojo.
>
> It already has begun, sir. People are crying about how they didnt
> get invited, and all sorts of crap. Hell, even someone sh*thead
> from FoH posted saying Innoruuk server is a bunch of lame f*cks
> if they think beating Cazic means anything big. FoH is just a bunch
> of lame pricks anyway. Every server has this 'lame prick elite'
> guild, you just need to avoid them.
>
> > I'm really really hoping the landscape changes by the time I get to
>45+...
>
> It's only gonna get worse. Granted, I'm new to the L50 scene... but
> I'm one of few L50 bards, so in a way I'm kinda a new L50 in the bard
> area, which is lacking on Innoruuk. So many L50s out there flooding
> up things. Dragons wont live more than 24 hours these days.
>
> Harm.
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
>with the subject submissions.
